name: Sang Vinh Nguyen
description: Software Engineer from Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam
bio1: I have nearly two years of experience in the IT industry, specializing in developing desktop applications using C++, Qt, and QML that interact with computer devices.
bio2: Additionally, I am skilled in working with ReactJS and NodeJS for web development. My expertise extends to working with both SQL and NoSQL databases, such as MySQL and MongoDB, as well as programming in Python.
bio3: Alongside my technical skills, I possess strong soft skills, including effective communication and teamwork. I am proficient in English, with the ability to communicate efficiently and deliver presentations. Furthermore, I have experience using Jira and working within Agile frameworks to manage and deliver projects successfully.
